00035 
00036 PlaneCylinder::PlaneCylinder(MultilayerPerceptron* newMultilayerPerceptron)       
00037 : ObjectiveFunctional(newMultilayerPerceptron)
00038 {
00039    // Control sentence
00040 
00041    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00042    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00043 
00044    if(numberOfInputs != 0 || numberOfOutputs != 0)
00045    {
00046       std::cerr << std::endl
00047                 << "Flood Error: PlaneCylinder class." << std::endl
00048                 << "PlaneCylinder(MultilayerPerceptron*) constructor." << std::endl
00049                 << "Number of inputs and outputs in multilayer perceptron must be 0." << std::endl
00050                 << std::endl;
00051 
00052       exit(1);
00053    }
00054 
00055    int numberOfIndependentParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfIndependentParameters();
00056 
00057    if(numberOfIndependentParameters != 2)
00058    {
00059       std::cerr << std::endl
00060                 << "Flood Error: PlaneCylinder class." << std::endl
00061                 << "PlaneCylinder(MultilayerPerceptron*) constructor." << std::endl
00062                 << "Number of independent parameters in multilayer perceptron must be 2." << std::endl
00063                 << std::endl;
00064 
00065       exit(1);
00066    }
00067 
00068    penalty = 100.0;
00069 }
00070

00097 // void setPenalty(double) method
00098 
00105 
00106 void PlaneCylinder::setPenalty(double newPenalty)
00107 {
00108    // Control sentence
00109 
00110    if(newPenalty <= 0.0)
00111    {
00112       std::cerr << std::endl
00113                 << "Flood Error: PlaneCylinder class." << std::endl
00114                 << "void setPenalty(double) method." << std::endl
00115                 << "Penalty must be greater than 0." << std::endl
00116                 << std::endl;
00117 
00118       exit(1);
00119    }
00120 
00121    // Set penalty
00122 
00123    penalty = newPenalty;
00124 }

00126 
00127 // double calculateError(void) method
00128 
00132 
00133 double PlaneCylinder::calculateError(void)
00134 {
00135    double error = 0.0;
00136 
00137    Vector<double> argument = multilayerPerceptron->getIndependentParameters();
00138 
00139    double x = argument[0];
00140    double y = argument[1];
00141    
00142    if(pow(x,2) + pow(y,2) <= 1.0)
00143    {
00144       error = 0.0;
00145    }
00146    else
00147    {
00148       error = pow(x,2) + pow(y,2) - 1.0;
00149    } 
00150    
00151    return(error);       
00152 }
00153 
00154 
00155 // double calculateEvaluation(void) method
00156 
00158 
00159 double PlaneCylinder::calculateEvaluation(void)
00160 {
00161     // Control sentence 
00162 
00163    if(multilayerPerceptron == NULL)
00164    {
00165       std::cerr << std::endl
00166                 << "Flood Error: PlaneCylinder class." << std::endl
00167                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00168                 << "Pointer to multilayer perceptron object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00169                 << std::endl;
00170 
00171       exit(1);
00172    }
00173 
00174    // Calculate evaluation
00175 
00176    numberOfEvaluations++;
00177 
00178    double evaluation = 0.0;
00179 
00180    Vector<double> argument = multilayerPerceptron->getIndependentParameters();
00181 
00182    double x = argument[0];
00183    double y = argument[1];
00184 
00185    double error = calculateError();
00186 
00187    evaluation = x + y + penalty*pow(error, 2);
00188 
00189    return(evaluation);
00190 }

00193 // void print(void) method
00194 
00199 
00200 void PlaneCylinder::print(void)
00201 {
00202    double error = calculateError();
00203    
00204    std::cout << "Flood Error " << error << std::endl;
00205 }
